item.description:
The Brettl-Hupfers will be at our lodge in Bartlett, NH the weekend of Feb 27 – March 1. The conditions so far this year have been excellent so if you have been on the fence about making a weekend trip, now is the time and our lodge is the place. We are about 2 miles from Attitash and close to Wildcat, Bretton Woods, Cranmore, and Black Mountain.

Some of us are tentatively planning to snowmobile thru a section of the Mount Washington Valley on Saturday. If you are interested in snowmobiling please indicate so in your RSVP and additional information will be forwarded. There is also snowshoeing, hiking and outlet shopping in the valley. On Saturday afternoon and evening there will be Après Ski events at nearby ski clubs.

Come up and join us for the weekend. Guests are welcome for $20 per night guest fee. Once you RSVP full directions and information will follow.

Members and guests must be 21+
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the club sitting around the fireplace.
item.name: Weekend at the Bretts, February 27 - March 1
